delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Requests.IsonEventHandler ( string  nicks  ) 

The response to a Sender.Ison request.

Parameters:
nicks If someone with this nick is on the same IRC network their nick will be returned here. Otherwise nick will be an empty string.
See also:
Listener.OnIson

string  channel,
string  kickee,
string  reason 
)

Someone has been kicked from a channel.

Parameters:
user Who did the kicking.
channel The channel that the person was kicked from.
kickee Who was kicked.
reason Why the person was kicked.
See also:
Listener.OnKick
delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Requests.ListEventHandler ( string  channel,
int  visibleNickCount,
string  topic,
bool  last 
)

The response to a Sender.List request.

Parameters:
channel The channel name.
visibleNickCount The number of visible users on that channel.
topic The channel's topic.
last True if this is the last reply.
See also:
Listener.OnList
delegate void Alaris.Irc.Delegates.Requests.NamesEventHandler ( string  channel,
string[]  nicks,
bool  last 
)

The response to a Sender.Names request.

Parameters:
channel The channel the user is on. "@" is used for secret channels, "*" for private channels, and "=" for public channels.
nicks A list of nicks on the channel. If this is the last reply then it will be empty. Nicks prefixed with a '@' are channel operators. Nicks prefixed with a '+' have voice privileges on a moderated channel, i.e. they are allowed to send public messages.
last True if this is the last names reply.
See also:
Listener.OnNames
